tpk::TcspkRefSys

tpk::TcspkRefSys Class Reference

#include <TcspkRefSys.h>

Inheritance diagram for tpk::TcspkRefSys:

[legend]

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Virtual base class for tcspk coordinate reference systems.

The TcspkRefSys class is a virtual base class for all the coordinate reference system classes that are supported by TCSpk and can be used as the tracking frame for a virtual telescope.

It provides a implementations for all the methods that are identical for all tcspk reference systems.

It stores the TCSpk frame type and a set of sky patch matrices.
